name: John G. RATCLIFFE v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator

parties: John G. RATCLIFFE v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: Oster, Groff & Prescott, George M. Prescott, Lincoln, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Susan E. McGuirl, Deputy Atty. Gen., Perry Shatkin, Chief Legal Officer (Taxation), for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
John G. RATCLIFFE v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.
No. 82-565-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Jan. 13, 1983.
Oster, Groff & Prescott, George M. Prescott, Lincoln, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Susan E. McGuirl, Deputy Atty. Gen., Perry Shatkin, Chief Legal Officer (Taxation), for respondent.
